string.name: passkey_credential_selection_action_title
string.comment: Title of the action to select a passkey. Will appear in the system passkey selector

string.name: passkey_credential_selection_action_subtitle
string.comment: Subtitle of the action to select a passkey. Will appear in the system passkey selector

resources.string: Seleziona una chiave di accesso da Proton Pass

string.name: password_credential_selection_action_title
string.comment: Title of the action to select a password credential. Will appear in the system password credential selector

string.name: password_credential_selection_action_subtitle
string.comment: Subtitle of the action to select a password credential. Will appear in the system password credential selector

resources.string: Seleziona una credenziale da Proton Pass
